title: Definition of horizontal asymptote
text: The horizontal asymptote describes the end behavior of the function. In other words, it describes the value f(x) converges to as x approaches $$\infty$$ and/or negative $$\infty$$.

title: Finding the horizontal asymptote
text: The last step is to determine the value that f(x) converges to as x approaches positive or negative $$\infty$$. It may be helpful to check various values of x (e.g. -100, -1000, -10000, etc.)
